mapper.select: select id, card_num cardNum,card_type ctype,card_pic cardPic,card_name cardName,card_annual cardannual,card_anntation1 anntationa1, card_anntation2 anntationa2,card_anntation3 anntationa3,card_anntation4 anntationa4,card_activity1 activity1, card_activity2 activity2 from cc_card_type
